column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I'm not that much of a coffee person
column2: but my bff thought the cappuccino was awesome. I had the almond croissant
column3: which was absolutely delicious (and huge). It was warm
column5: and flaky with sliced almonds and sugar on the top
column6: as well as a almond filling on the inside! My bff tried the chocolate brioche
column7: (I think that's how you spell it?) which was like a pastry filled with Nutella and topped with chocolate. It looked super cute and tasted yummy!
